Package de.unisiegen.tpml.core.util

Interface Summary
Environment<S,E> Generic base interface for all environments used while proving properties about programs.
 

Class Summary
AbstractEnvironment<S,E> Abstract implementation of the generic Environment interface.
AbstractEnvironment.Mapping<S,E> The store mappings, mapping symbols to entries.
IntegerUtilities Static class, which provides several static utility functions for handling integers and related constructs.
IterableNodeList This is a decorator class for the NodeList class, which represents a list of Nodes below a parent node in a DOM Document.
StringUtilities Static class, which provides several static utility functions for handling strings.
